result.markdown:
--- format: html: css: webex.css include-after-body: webex.js theme: themecustom.scss fontsize: 1.4em --- **Which of the following sentences is TRUE?**
**Mark T (True) or F (False) in each of the following sentences.** ::: {.webex-check .webex-box} An underwriter is an investment bank that manages the IPO process and helps the company sell its stock. An initial public offering (IPO) is not necessarily the first time a company sells its stock to the public. Underwriters face no risk during an IPO, so that a greenshoe provision is usually not necessary. A seasoned equity offering (SEO) is the sale of stock by a company that is already publicly traded. A cash offer occurs when new shares are offered only to existing shareholders. A rights offer occurs when new shares are sold to investors at large. The stock price reaction to an SEO is positive on average. New issues are highly cyclical. The transaction costs of an IPO are usually low. IPOs are underpriced on average. ::: ___ IPOs are underpriced on average. The transaction costs of an IPO are usually low. A seasoned equity offering (SEO) is the sale of stock by a company that is already publicly traded. A cash offer occurs when new shares are offered only to existing shareholders. New issues are highly cyclical. The stock price reaction to an SEO is positive on average. A rights offer occurs when new shares are sold to investors at large. An underwriter is an investment bank that manages the IPO process and helps the company sell its stock. Underwriters face no risk during an IPO, so that a greenshoe provision is usually not necessary. An initial public offering (IPO) is not necessarily the first time a company sells its stock to the public.
